---
title: Air Squat
---

# Setup

Feet shoulder width apart
Toes straight or slightly toed out (0-15&deg;)

# Action

- Squat down as if youre sitting down
- Return to starting position


# Key points

- Tall chest
- Heel down
- Hip crease below knees
- Neutral spine

# Faults 

- Shoulder drop forward
- Heel coming up
- Not going parallel
- Lose neutral spine

# Tx Principles

- Motor control vs mobility issue
- Positional isometrics = Right cueing for putting the pt in the correct positions and training motor control there
